snippet.title: SCP-479: Shadows of the Mind. Trailer.
snippet.description:
Trailer of SCP-479: Shadows of the Mind. New horror game on PC awaits you as you navigate through the dark corners of your mind, confronting your deepest fears and uncovering secrets that were meant to stay hidden. Can you overcome the shadows that lurk within? 

White Faction Studio's SCP-479: Shadows of the Mind, based on SCP Foundation from scp-wiki.wikidot.com, is now on Steam under CC BY-SA 3.0.
👇Add to your wishlist
store.steampowered.com/app/2486180/SCP479
